CustomField.description: This cross object formula is used to retrieve the "Service Appointment Number" string value from the related Service Resource record, in order to show a data table of all Service Resources and their total labour time on each SA in the flow "Work Complete Review". This is useful so that the JC can see a preview on how many Labour Lines will be created for each of the Crew after the flow finishes.
CustomField.label: Service Appointment Number
